title: Why did Raden Wijaya flee to Madura Island? - Quora

response.answer_text: Since Jayakatwang conquer Singhasari, Raden Wijaya flee to Madura and ask help from Arya Wirajaya, ruler of Sumenep and Madura to save him since he afriad if Jayakatwang army search him. When Jayakatwang, king of Kediri declare as ruler of Java, Arya Wirajaya ask him to hire Raden Wijaya and Jayakatwang give Wijaya some area in Trowulan (and later become Majapahit)
